general.quote: Spread love everywhere you go. Let no one ever come to you without leaving happier.
general.author: Mother Teresa

general.quote: When you reach the end of your rope, tie a knot in it and hang on.
general.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

general.quote: Always remember that you are absolutely unique. Just like everyone else.
general.author: Margaret Mead

general.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
general.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

general.quote: Tell me and I forget. Teach me and I remember. Involve me and I learn.
general.author: Benjamin Franklin

general.quote: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.
general.author: Helen Keller

general.quote: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
general.author: Aristotle

general.quote: Whoever is happy will make others happy too.
general.author: Anne Frank

general.quote: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
general.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

general.quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
general.author: Wayne Gretzky

general.quote: I have learned over the years that when one's mind is made up, this diminishes fear.
general.author: Rosa Parks

general.quote: I alone cannot change the world, but I can cast a stone across the water to create many ripples.
general.author: Mother Teresa

general.quote: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says, ‘I'm possible!'
general.author: Audrey Hepburn

general.quote: Whatever the mind of man can conceive and believe, it can achieve.
general.author: Napoleon Hill

general.quote: If you look at what you have in life, you'll always have more. If you look at what you don't have in life, you'll never have enough.
general.author: Oprah Winfrey

general.quote: I would rather die of passion than of boredom.
general.author: Vincent van Gogh

general.quote: I attribute my success to this: I never gave or took any excuse.
general.author: Florence Nightingale

general.quote: If you're offered a seat on a rocket ship, don't ask what seat! Just get on.
general.author: Sheryl Sandberg

general.quote: I didn't fail the test. I just found 100 ways to do it wrong.
general.author: Benjamin Franklin

general.quote: Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears.
general.author: Les Brown

general.quote: When everything seems to be going against you, remember that the airplane takes off against the wind, not with it.
general.author: Henry Ford

life.quote: You will face many defeats in life, but never let yourself be defeated.
life.author: Maya Angelou

life.quote: In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
life.author: Abraham Lincoln

life.quote: Never let the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game.
life.author: Babe Ruth

life.quote: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all.
life.author: Helen Keller

life.quote: Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
life.author: Thomas A. Edison

life.quote: You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself any direction you choose.
life.author: Dr. Seuss

life.quote: If life were predictable it would cease to be life and be without flavor.
life.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

life.quote: Life is a succession of lessons which must be lived to be understood.
life.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

life.quote: Life is never fair, and perhaps it is a good thing for most of us that it is not.
life.author: Oscar Wilde

life.quote: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
life.author: Tony Robbins

life.quote: In this life we cannot do great things. We can only do small things with great love.
life.author: Mother Teresa

life.quote: Only a life lived for others is a life worthwhile.
life.author: Albert Einstein

life.quote: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
life.author: John Lennon

life.quote: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams! Live the life you've imagined.
life.author: Henry David Thoreau

life.quote: Love is the strongest force the world possesses.
life.author: Mahatma Gandhi

success.quote: Success is not final; failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
success.author: Winston S. Churchill

success.quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
success.author: Henry David Thoreau

success.quote: If you really look closely, most overnight successes took a long time.
success.author: Steve Jobs

success.quote: The secret of success is to do the common thing uncommonly well.
success.author: John D. Rockefeller Jr.

success.quote: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
success.author: Thomas Jefferson

success.quote: The real test is not whether you avoid this failure, because you won't. It's whether you let it harden or shame you into inaction, or whether you learn from it; whether you choose to persevere.
success.author: Barack Obama

success.quote: Don't be distracted by criticism. Remember -- the only taste of success some people get is to take a bite out of you.
success.author: Zig Ziglar

success.quote: Success seems to be connected with action. Successful people keep moving. They make mistakes but they don't quit.
success.author: Conrad Hilton

success.quote: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
success.author: Colin Powell

success.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
success.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

success.quote: Successful people do what unsuccessful people are not willing to do. Don't wish it were easier; wish you were better.
success.author: Jim Rohn

success.quote: If you set your goals ridiculously high and it's a failure, you will fail above everyone else's success.
success.author: James Cameron

success.quote: A successful man is one who can lay a firm foundation with the bricks others have thrown at him.
success.author: David Brinkley

success.quote: Try not to become a man of success. Rather become a man of value.
success.author: Albert Einstein

success.quote: Always bear in mind that your own resolution to success is more important than any other one thing.
success.author: Abraham Lincoln

success.quote: Work hard in silence. Success be your noise.
success.author: Frank Ocean

success.quote: Successful people don't fear failure but understand that it's necessary to learn and grow from.
success.author: Robert Kiyosaki

success.quote: I learned this, at least, by my experiment: that if one advances confidently in the direction of his dreams, and endeavors to live the life which he has imagined, he will meet with a success unexpected in common hours.
success.author: Henry David Thoreau

success.quote: If at first you don't succeed, try, try again. Then quit. No use being a damn fool about it.
success.author: W.C. Fields

success.quote: It is better to fail in originality than to succeed in imitation.
success.author: Herman Melville

success.quote: Success is liking yourself, liking what you do, and liking how you do it.
success.author: Maya Angelou

success.quote: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
success.author: Roy T. Bennett

success.quote: Success is getting what you want, happiness is wanting what you get.
success.author: W. P. Kinsella

success.quote: Failure is the condiment that gives success its flavor.
success.author: Truman Capote

success.quote: The worst part of success is trying to find someone who is happy for you.
success.author: Bette Midler

success.quote: Success makes so many people hate you. I wish it wasn't that way. It would be wonderful to enjoy success without seeing envy in the eyes of those around you.
success.author: Marilyn Monroe

success.quote: If A is a success in life, then A equals x plus y plus z. Work is x; y is play; and z is keeping your mouth shut.
success.author: Albert Einstein

success.quote: Cry. Forgive. Learn. Move on. Let your tears water the seeds of your future happiness.
success.author: Steve Maraboli

success.quote: I'm a success today because I had a friend who believed in me and I didn't have the heart to let him down.
success.author: Abraham Lincoln

motivational.quote: The Best Way To Get Started Is To Quit Talking And Begin Doing.
motivational.author: Walt Disney

motivational.quote: The Pessimist Sees Difficulty In Every Opportunity. The Optimist Sees Opportunity In Every Difficulty.
motivational.author: Winston Churchill

motivational.quote: Don’t Let Yesterday Take Up Too Much Of Today.
motivational.author: Will Rogers

motivational.quote: You Learn More From Failure Than From Success. Don’t Let It Stop You. Failure Builds Character.
motivational.author: Unknown

motivational.quote: It’s Not Whether You Get Knocked Down, It’s Whether You Get Up.
motivational.author: Vince Lombardi

motivational.quote: If You Are Working On Something That You Really Care About, You Don’t Have To Be Pushed. The Vision Pulls You.
motivational.author: Steve Jobs

motivational.quote: People Who Are Crazy Enough To Think They Can Change The World, Are The Ones Who Do.
motivational.author: Rob Siltanen

motivational.quote: Failure Will Never Overtake Me If My Determination To Succeed Is Strong Enough.
motivational.author: Og Mandino

motivational.quote: Entrepreneurs Are Great At Dealing With Uncertainty And Also Very Good At Minimizing Risk. That’s The Classic Entrepreneur.
motivational.author: Mohnish Pabrai

motivational.quote: We May Encounter Many Defeats But We Must Not Be Defeated.
motivational.author: Maya Angelou

motivational.quote: Knowing Is Not Enough; We Must Apply. Wishing Is Not Enough; We Must Do.
motivational.author: Johann Wolfgang Von Goethe

motivational.quote: Imagine Your Life Is Perfect In Every Respect; What Would It Look Like?
motivational.author: Brian Tracy

motivational.quote: Whether You Think You Can Or Think You Can’t, You’re Right.
motivational.author: Henry Ford

motivational.quote: Security Is Mostly A Superstition. Life Is Either A Daring Adventure Or Nothing.
motivational.author: Helen Keller

motivational.quote: The Man Who Has Confidence In Himself Gains The Confidence Of Others.
motivational.author: Hasidic Proverb

motivational.quote: The Only Limit To Our Realization Of Tomorrow Will Be Our Doubts Of Today.
motivational.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

motivational.quote: Creativity Is Intelligence Having Fun.
motivational.author: Albert Einstein

motivational.quote: What You Lack In Talent Can Be Made Up With Desire, Hustle And Giving 110% All The Time.
motivational.author: Don Zimmer

motivational.quote: Do What You Can With All You Have, Wherever You Are.
motivational.author: Theodore Roosevelt

motivational.quote: Develop An ‘Attitude Of Gratitude’. Say Thank You To Everyone You Meet For Everything They Do For You.
motivational.author: Brian Tracy

motivational.quote: You Are Never Too Old To Set Another Goal Or To Dream A New Dream.
motivational.author: C.S. Lewis

motivational.quote: To See What Is Right And Not Do It Is A Lack Of Courage.
motivational.author: Confucius

motivational.quote: Reading Is To The Mind, As Exercise Is To The Body.
motivational.author: Brian Tracy

motivational.quote: For Every Reason It’s Not Possible, There Are Hundreds Of People Who Have Faced The Same Circumstances And Succeeded.
motivational.author: Jack Canfield

motivational.quote: Things Work Out Best For Those Who Make The Best Of How Things Work Out.
motivational.author: John Wooden

motivational.quote: A Room Without Books Is Like A Body Without A Soul.
motivational.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

motivational.quote: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
motivational.author: Mahatma Gandhi

motivational.quote: Education is the most powerful weapon we can use to change the world.
motivational.author: Nelson Mandela

fun.quote: Forgive your enemies, but never forget their names.
fun.author: John F. Kennedy

fun.quote: The road to success is always under construction.
fun.author: Lily Tomlin

fun.quote: I’m in shape. Round is a shape.
fun.author: George Carlin

fun.quote: Never have more children than you have car windows.
fun.author: Erma Bombeck

fun.quote: If you can’t live without me, why aren’t you dead already?
fun.author: Cynthia Heimel

fun.quote: He who laughs last didn’t get the joke.
fun.author: Charles de Gaulle

fun.quote: My favourite machine at the gym is the vending machine.
fun.author: Caroline Rhea

fun.quote: If a book about failures doesn’t sell, is it a success?
fun.author: Jerry Seinfeld

fun.quote: If you’re too open-minded; your brains will fall out.
fun.author: Lawrence Ferlinghetti

fun.quote: Never miss a good chance to shut up.
fun.author: Will Rogers

fun.quote: I don’t hate you. I just don’t like that you exist
fun.author: Gena Showalter

fun.quote: Don’t gobblefunk around with words.
fun.author: Roald Dahl

fun.quote: A penny saved is a penny earned.
fun.author: Benjamin Franklin

fun.quote: The funniest people are the saddest ones.
fun.author: Confucius

fun.quote: Why is there so much month left at the end of the money?
fun.author: John Barrymore

fun.quote: I came from a real tough neighbourhood. Once a guy pulled a knife on me. I knew he wasn’t a professional, the knife had butter on it.
fun.author: Rodney Dangerfield

fun.quote: A word to the wise ain’t necessary, it’s the stupid ones who need advice.
fun.author: Bill Cosby

fun.quote: Always go to other people’s funerals, otherwise, they won’t come to yours.
fun.author: Yogi Berra

fun.quote: Women are wiser than men because they know less and understand more.
fun.author: James Thurber

fun.quote: I’d rather have 1% of the effort of 100 men than 100% of my own effort.
fun.author: J. Paul Getty

fun.quote: Hooray! Hooray! The end of the world has been postponed!
fun.author: Hergé

fun.quote: Imagination is more important than knowledge.
fun.author: Albert Einstein

fun.quote: At the end of the day, if I can say I had fun, it was a good day.
fun.author: Simon Biles

programming.quote: Any fool can write code that a computer can understand. Good programmers write code that humans can understand.
programming.author: Martin Fowler

programming.quote: First, solve the problem. Then, write the code.
programming.author: John Johnson

programming.quote: Experience is the name everyone gives to their mistakes.
programming.author: Oscar Wilde

programming.quote: Java is to JavaScript what car is to Carpet.
programming.author: Chris Heilmann

programming.quote: Sometimes it pays to stay in bed on Monday, rather than spending the rest of the week debugging Monday’s code.
programming.author: Dan Salomon

programming.quote: Perfection is achieved not when there is nothing more to add, but rather when there is nothing more to take away.
programming.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

programming.quote: Ruby is rubbish! PHP is phpantastic!
programming.author: Nikita Popov

programming.quote: Code is like humor. When you have to explain it, it’s bad.
programming.author: Cory House

programming.quote: Optimism is an occupational hazard of programming: feedback is the treatment.
programming.author: Kent Beck

programming.quote: When to use iterative development? You should use iterative development only on projects that you want to succeed.
programming.author: Martin Fowler

programming.quote: Before software can be reusable it first has to be usable.
programming.author: Ralph Johnson

programming.quote: Make it work, make it right, make it fast.
programming.author: Kent Beck

programming.quote: Always code as if the guy who ends up maintaining your code will be a violent psychopath who knows where you live
programming.author: John Woods

programming.quote: I'm not a great programmer; I'm just a good programmer with great habits.
programming.author: Kent Beck

programming.quote: Truth can only be found in one place: the code.
programming.author: Robert C. Martin

programming.quote: Give a man a program, frustrate him for a day.Teach a man to program, frustrate him for a lifetime.
programming.author: Muhammad Waseem

programming.quote: That's the thing about people who think they hate computers. What they really hate is lousy programmers.
programming.author: Larry Niven

programming.quote: A language that doesn't affect the way you think about programming is not worth knowing.
programming.author: Alan J. Perlis

programming.quote: Walking on water and developing software from a specification are easy if both are frozen.
programming.author: Edward V. Berard

programming.quote: Perl – The only language that looks the same before and after RSA encryption.
programming.author: Keith Bostic

programming.quote: The most important property of a program is whether it accomplishes the intention of its user.
programming.author: C.A.R. Hoare

programming.quote: Object-oriented programming offers a sustainable way to write spaghetti code. It lets you accrete programs as a series of patches.
programming.author: Paul Graham

programming.quote: Programming isn't about what you know; it's about what you can figure out.
programming.author: Chris Pine

dream.quote: Every great dream begins with a dreamer. Always remember, you have within you the strength, the patience, and the passion to reach for the stars to change the world.
dream.author: Harriet Tubman

dream.quote: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
dream.author: Walt Disney

dream.quote: Follow your dreams, believe in yourself and don’t give up.
dream.author: Rachel Corrie

dream.quote: We all have dreams. But in order to make dreams come into reality, it takes an awful lot of determination, dedication, self-discipline, and effort.
dream.author: Jesse Owens

dream.quote: I like the dreams of the future better than the history of the past.
dream.author: Thomas Jefferson

dream.quote: There is only one thing that makes a dream impossible to achieve: the fear of failure.
dream.author: Paulo Coelho

dream.quote: You have to dream before your dreams can come true.
dream.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

dream.quote: Dreams are the touchstones of our characters.
dream.author: Henry David Thoreau

dream.quote: Dream no small dreams for they have no power to move the hearts of men.
dream.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

dream.quote: It takes a lot of courage to show your dreams to someone else.
dream.author: Erma Bombeck
